short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Your Tabs with a Dazzling Shooting Stars Theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Tabs with a Dazzling Shooting Stars Theme.

AstroWeb redefines your Chrome browsing experience by replacing the default new tab with a captivating shooting stars theme, combining aesthetics with enhanced functionality. Personalize your browsing by adding your name, which will be displayed prominently on the new tab.

Key Features:

1. Stunning Shooting Stars Theme: Elevate your browsing with a dynamic, visually appealing background of shooting stars.
2. Personalized Touch: Add your name to the tab, making it uniquely yours. Your name is stored securely in the local storage and is never shared.
3. Quick Fullscreen Toggle: Switch between fullscreen mode effortlessly, perfect for focused work or entertainment.
4. Google Apps Dropdown: Access all Google apps quickly and easily with a convenient dropdown menu, right from your new tab.

Security and Privacy:

AstroWeb respects your privacy. The only information it stores is your name, saved locally in your browser's storage. No personal data is collected or shared, and the extension does not require any permissions, ensuring a secure, worry-free experience.

Upgrade your Chrome experience with AstroWeb and enjoy a blend of beauty, functionality, and privacy.
